TopicTitle: KSP 1.73 and ASET mod IVA Replacements

Articles.Content:
Hello guys.

Im playing KSP again after longer time, version 1.7.3 with History DLC and breaking ground.

Im looking for some fancy cockpits, like pods with RPM screens and interactable knobs and buttons.

I tried all of the ASET replacement IVA pods but they dont work. Do you have the same problem? All mods are up to date since I installed everything fresh. - Only the ALCOR by ASET is working just fine

Tried manual install and over CKAN - problem persists.

Tried Reinstall and fresh isntall, watched a lot of videos and I didnt found a solution to my problem.

Maybe are these mods just outdated? Or am I dumb to install it?

 

Thx.

 

Edited September 28, 2019 by domkyn
bad title
